The 23-year independence period has been a significant year for our statehood, development, and future.
Simultaneous implementation of political and economic reforms insures us from major problems, stable (cont) http://t.co/pd7Q4O50lf
Azerbaijan is a country with functional democratic institutions. We believe in democracy and the rule of law (cont) http://t.co/mHqts0JqBN
We have built a modern, self-confident country in a very short time.
In the coming years, political reforms will be one of the key issues in our agenda.
We need to work harder and more reforms.
Azerbaijan has very clear foreign policy priorities.
The promises we have always coincide with what we do.
Therefore, Azerbaijan is now considered a reliable partner, and our friendly partners and partners have confidence in us.
Mechanisms for implementing common criteria, decisions of international organizations have been developed (cont.) Http://t.co/X6IDpEkUxd
We must achieve the settlement of the Armenian-Azerbaijani conflict. This is our country, our people, (cont) http://t.co/NV6WCZMyhj
Azerbaijan has a good reputation as a country that supports foreign investment. Over the past 10 years (cont) http://t.co/z0wA3pPrXf
We must achieve the settlement of the Armenian-Azerbaijani conflict. This is our country, our people, (cont) http://t.co/1RiYcsGl7o

Azerbaijan is the first country in the world to have Caspian, Black and Mediterranean seamless pipelines (cont) http://t.co/PVzMeT2lFu
The Southern Gas Corridor is a historic project proposed by Azerbaijan. This is the most current (cont) http://t.co/wqRD2aUt1X for Europe

PM at the Cabinet meeting: With heavy grief we found three bodies in. All signs indicate they are of our abducted youths Eyal, Gilad and Naftali.
They were abducted & murdered in cold blood by human animals. On behalf of the entire Jewish People, I would like to tell the dear families-
the mothers, fathers, grandmothers and grandfathers, and brothers and sisters - we are deeply saddened, the entire nation weeps with you.
Vengeance for the blood of a small child, Satan has not yet created. Neither has vengeance for the blood of 3 pure youths who were on their>
way home to their parents who will not see them anymore. Hamas is responsible and Hamas will pay. May the memories of the three boys be blessed.
